title-part.text: PRINTED MATTER CHARACTERISED BY IDENTIFICATION OR SECURITY FEATURES; PRINTED MATTER OF SPECIAL FORMAT OR STYLE NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR
DEVICES FOR USE THEREWITH AND NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: match books A24F27/12; picture books with additional toy effects A63H33/38; indexing features B42F21/00; educational or demonstration appliances G09B, e.g. textbooks for teaching foreign languages G09B19/08

in which the fillings and the spine portions of the covers are secured integrally, e.g. paper-backs ("livres brochès", "Broschüren")
in which the fillings and covers are united by other means
Files with adhesive strips for mounting papers

note.note-paragraph: Details of covers which are the same for book covers and covers of loose-leaf binders, are classified in B42D3/00 only

removably attached to the book

actuated by a single spring

title-part.text: Translucent or partly translucent parts, e.g. windows
Indexing scheme associated with group B42D25/00, relating to specific characteristics of identity, credit, cheque or like information-bearing cards
Structure or construction of identity, credit, cheque or like information-bearing cards

note.note-paragraph:
Groups B42D2033/00 - B42D2033/46 are no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2014-10-01. The backfile of these groups is being reclassified into groups B42D25/00 - B42D25/485.
Until reclassification is complete, groups B42D2033/00 - B42D2033/46 and B42D25/00 - B42D25/485 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: with a foldable or removable part
with separable mating or co-operating elements
Nature or shape of the markings provided on identity, credit, cheque or like information-bearing cards

note.note-paragraph:
Groups B42D2035/00, B42D2035/02, B42D2035/06, B42D2035/08, B42D2035/12 -B42D2035/16, B42D2035/20, B42D2035/24, B42D2035/26, B42D2035/30, B42D2035/34, B42D2035/36, B42D2035/44, and B42D2035/50 are no longer used for the classification of documents as of 2014-10-01. The backfile of these groups is being reclassified into groups B42D25/00 - B42D25/485.
Until reclassification is complete, groups B42D2035/00, B42D2035/02, B42D2035/06, B42D2035/08, B42D2035/12 - B42D2035/16, B42D2035/20, B42D2035/24, B42D2035/26, B42D2035/30, B42D2035/34, B42D2035/36, B42D2035/44, B42D2035/50 and B42D25/00 - B42D25/485 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Markings visible under particular conditions or containing coded information
visible in transmitted light, e.g. in a window region
Corresponding markings appearing in different shapes or at different places
